name: Damen Shipyards Group
goal:
At Damen, it's all about ships - it's what we do, it's who we are. We design them, we build them, we service them. We live them! We have a vision and we are on a mission. Read about them here, in our global Vision & Mission statement.

Our mission

Damen is a client-focused, international and family-owned shipbuilder with Dutch roots. We design and build innovative ships of excellent quality, supported by a worldwide network of sales and services including maintenance and repair & conversion facilities.

Our vision

Our aim is to become a global market leader in the niche markets of shipbuilding, shiprepair & conversion and related services, growing step by step developing quality vessels and services.
